attributes.action: Not gear policies towards penalising people who take pride in improving their homes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is the choice of the induvidual what they spend their income on, we all need at some point to make changes to our homes and a lot of people take pride in their home (which is the biggest investment we make in our whole life time)I find it unacceptable to pass laws which single out families and individuals for choosing to improve their homes instead of having several holiays a year or gambling, socialising etc..
